data.subject: Christmas Cards (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Christmas cards, Christmas cards
 Love to see the pretty Christmas cards
 Bringing you sweet regards

data.subject: I`d Like You For Christmas (Remastered)
data.lyric:
I'd like you for Christmas
 Please make my wish come true
 'Cause I'd dream trees and deck the hallw

data.subject: Baby`s First Christmas (Remastered)
data.lyric:
It's baby's first Christmas
 It's somethin' to see
 Mommy and Daddy
 Trimmin' baby's Christmas tree

data.subject: Christmas Bells (Remastered)
data.lyric:
The Christmas bells are ringing
 The holly's at the windowpane
 I hear the children singing
 It's Ch

data.subject: Frosty The Snow Man (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Frosty the snowman
 Was a jolly happy soul
 With a corncob pipe and a button nose
 And two eyes made

data.subject: The Lord`s Prayer (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Our Father
 Who art in heaven
 Hallowed be Thy name
 Thy kingdom come
 Thy will be done
 On earth as

data.subject: Jingle Bells (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Dashing through the snow
 In a one horse open sleigh
 Through the fields we go
 Laughing all the way

data.subject: I`ll Be Home For Christmas (Originally Remastered)
data.lyric:
I'll be home for Christmas
 You can plan on me
 Please have snow and mistletoe
 And presents 'neath

data.subject: Adeste Fideles (Remastered)
data.lyric:
O Come All Ye Faithful
 Joyful and triumphant
 O come ye, O come ye to Bethlehem
 Come and behold Hi

data.subject: Mele Kalikimaka (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Mele Kalikimaka is the thing to say
 On a bright Hawaiian Christmas day
 That's the island greeting
